translation.aboutText: My name is Pedro Teixeira Villafuerte, I am a Computer Science student and front-end developer. I have some projects using HTML, CSS and Javascript, improving myself more and more with React. I have one year of professional experience as a Test Analyst using the Selenium tool. Furthermore, I am studying and already have a Back-End project using Node.
translation.project1Text: First React project using Vite and MaterialUI. The ideal of this project was to have a place that brought together all my projects and knowledge. Throughout development, the i18n library was added to handle the language switching part. Despite not being a Design expert, I managed to start the first session through a video lesson and continued on my own.
translation.project2Text: Full stack project carried out following a course on the Alura platform. The main objective was to study CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Read). The front-end development was done with React and the back-end using Node. Throughout development, I learned how to use the postman tool to test HTTP requests.
translation.project3Text: RPA (Robot Process Automation) project for BMG bank. The programming logic is present on github, but without the sensitive data. Selenium and the Python language were used. The application flow is to read a spreadsheet, do a search, check information, save the necessary data and generate a log for each iteration.
